thread.title: BRIEF-W&T Offshore Announces Gulf Of Mexico Joint Exploration And Development Program With Investor Group

title: BRIEF-W&T Offshore Announces Gulf Of Mexico Joint Exploration And Development Program With Investor Group

organizations.name: brief-w&t offshore announces gulf of mexico
brief-w&t offshore announces gulf of mexico joint

text: March 12, 2018 / 9:51 PM / Updated 31 minutes ago BRIEF-W&T Offshore Announces Gulf Of Mexico Joint Exploration And Development Program With Investor Group Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - W&T Offshore Inc: * W&T OFFSHORE ANNOUNCES GULF OF MEXICO JOINT EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM WITH INVESTOR GROUP * W&T OFFSHORE - ‍ANTICIPATED PROJECT LEVEL COMMITMENT FOR DRILLING PROGRAM OF UP TO $419.6 MILLION​ * W&T OFFSHORE-RECEIVES INITIAL CASH REIMBURSEMENT OF ABOUT $20 MILLION FOR COSTS ALREADY INCURRED IN RELATION TO DRILLING OF SOME WELLS INCLUDED IN PROGRAM​ * W&T OFFSHORE INC - ‍W&T INITIALLY RECEIVES 30.0% OF NET REVENUES FROM DRILLING PROGRAM WELLS​ * W&T OFFSHORE INC - ‍UPON INVESTOR GROUP ACHIEVING CERTAIN RETURN THRESHOLDS, W&T’S SHARE OF WELL NET REVENUE INCREASES TO 38.4%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
